definitions.definition: a person or animal that lives in or occupies a place.
examples: resident, occupant, occupier, dweller, squatter, settler; Morelocal, native; formaldenizen; population, populace, people, public, community, citizenry, townsfolk, townspeople "the inhabitants have organized a protest"Morelocal, native; denizen; population, populace, people, public, community, citizenry, townsfolk, townspeople the inhabitants have organized a protest

definitions.definition: a person who fulfills the requirements for legal residency.
